basics.name: Olina Kung
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A. in Marketing and Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

education.area: Marketing and Management Information Systems (expected Spring, 2026)

work.summary: Provide assistance to instructors and students using the labs.
highlights: Enforce computer lab rules and ensure lab equipments are appropriately handled
Assisted customers with their attire for senior portraits

volunteer.summary: Managed social media platforms and created designs for official events. Planned recruitment schedule and presentations.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to first-time degree-seeking students who maintain a 3.8 GPA.
